title: EVERY SINGLE DAY MENTALITY
itunes:title: EVERY SINGLE DAY MENTALITY
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
EVERY SINGLE DAY MENTALITY! Put in the work EVERYDAY, NO EXCUSES. One of the Best Motivational Speeches Ever featuring Marcus Taylor (https://bit.ly/MarcusTaylorMotiversity).


"Small steps every single day will lead to big results."


Music by Really Slow Motion (https://bit.ly/RSMMusic).


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
